channel.title: Nevada Welcome Center on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Nevada Welcome Center on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-15 South - BL-15 Next Right
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 122. Use Exit 122 for BL-15 and Nevada Welcome Center. This is the north end of the Mesquite Business Loop.
